content.question: Task 4: Cultural Presentation You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read the topic of your presentation. You will have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible. Topic of presentation: Choose ONE example of Chinese literature (such as Three Kingdoms [San guo yan yi], Dream of the Red Mansion [Hong lou meng], Journey to the West [Xi you ji], etc.). In your presentation, describe this example of Chinese literature and explain its significance.
